# calendar

**Type Property**

Identifier for the calendar of a date components object.

## Declaration

```swift
static var calendar: NSCalendar.Unit { get }
```

## Discussion

The corresponding value is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar].

## Specifying Calendars and Time Zones

- **timeZone**: Identifier for the time zone of a date components object.
